dialogues.speaker: BOSSP
dialogues.text: Agent [Name], the city of Chicago has given us 24 hours to crack this case.

dialogues.speaker: BOSSP
dialogues.text: To aid you through this, I have sent Babemax as your personal assistant for this investigation. I’ve texted you his location.

dialogues.speaker: BOSSP
dialogues.text: Work closely and let nothing deter you from unveiling the truth.

choices.response: Got it, Boss! With Babemax, I’ll look into every detail we come across. We’re on a tight schedule, but I’m ready to make a strategic plan to uncover the truth.
Understood, Boss. I’ll look beyond the obvious, connecting the dots of what’s unseen. 24 hours is tight, but we’ll do the best we can and pivot as new information comes to light.

dialogues.speaker: BOSSP
dialogues.text: That’s precisely what I like to hear. Now, get cracking!

choices.response: Why were you sleeping if you’re a robot...?
Cool, a sleeping robot! Nice to meet you Babemax.

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: Haha although I’m mostly automated, I feel sensations like hunger and fatigue. Gotta get my beauty sleep, y’know?

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: Anyways, which direction would you like to go with our investigation?

choices.response: Identify potential culprits based on financial motives
Learn more about Lizzi’s personal relationships

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: Don’t worry, we were given permission to enter Lizzi’s house to find evidence.

choices.response: Option 1
Option 2

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: That is Lizzi’s house down the road. We could ask around this neighborhood to find clues.

choices.response: We should look for phone records of her interactions with others.
Let’s go chat with her acquaintances around here. See what they think.

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: Hey [NAME]! I was able to extract some records from this phone Lizzi left behind.

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: Take a look at this call with her husband Cornelius.

choices.response: Let's see it.

dialogues.speaker: LIZZI
dialogues.text: Cornelius! When are you thinking of coming back? It’s already 1 am.

dialogues.speaker: CORNELIUS
dialogues.text: Sorry honey, didn’t see the time pass. I’ll head back now.

dialogues.speaker: LIZZI
dialogues.text: Good. I don’t know why you’re always out so late at night, but please-zz do let m– zz bzzttt zz-

dialogues.speaker: CORNELIUS
dialogues.text: Lizzi..? Hello, Lizzi?!

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: Oh there's one from her former boss Elon Tusk as well.

choices.response: Elon Tusk? Why was he calling her? Babemax, show me that.
Hmm... Interesting... Can you show me that?

dialogues.speaker: TUSK
dialogues.text: Lizzi, how long do you plan to let Cornelius leech off of you?

dialogues.speaker: LIZZI
dialogues.text: Don’t talk like that about my husband! He deserves some rest from work.

dialogues.speaker: TUSK
dialogues.text: Fine. But he’s been doing nothing for years now. Don’t let him drag you down.

dialogues.speaker: LIZZI
dialogues.text: That’s for me to decide. And stop calling me outside work.

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: Beep. Beep. Incoming call from Boss P.

choices.response: I hope Boss P has good news for us!
Boss P... This must be important.

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: Let’s go chat with her acquaintances around here. See what they think.

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: Who should we talk to first?

choices.response: The spouse is always the most suspicious. Let's talk to her husband Cornelius.
Based on the information I've gathered, she had a rocky relationship with her former boss Elon Tusk. Let's talk to him.

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: Wassup Cornelius!

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: Beep. Beep. Incoming call from Boss P.

choices.response: I hope Boss P has good news for us!
Boss P... This must be important.

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: Wassup Tusk!

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: Beep. Beep. Urgent message from Boss P. We have to meet him ASAP

choices.response: I hope Boss P has good news for us!
Boss P... This must be important.

dialogues.speaker: BOSSP
dialogues.text: Agent [NAME] and Agent Babemax, I have some new information to relay to you.

dialogues.speaker: BOSSP
dialogues.text: We just completed a forensics analysis and have tracked down the murderer’s identity. They are a high-ranking member of the underground assassin’s guild.

dialogues.speaker: BOSSP
dialogues.text: We also found that they were hired by Company X around the time Lizzi died.

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: Oh sus… Well [NAME],

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: what do you think we should do next?

choices.response: Let’s infiltrate Company X undercover.
Let’s gather information from afar through cyber-breaching.

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: Hey check this out! I was able to decrypt this guarded file from Company X’s server and it seems to mention Lizzi along with another name… “Birb?” New name to me, wonder who she is.

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: Who do you want to approach and talk to further?

choices.response: Search the area and find Birb.
Investigate Elon Tusk further.

dialogues.speaker: BIRB
dialogues.text: Oh goodness! Don’t sneak up on me like that.

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: Who are you and what do you want?

choices.response: Sorry, I didn't mean to surprise you.
… (show detective badge)

dialogues.speaker: TUSK
dialogues.text: Ah, I see you’ve come back to talk with me.

dialogues.speaker: TUSK
dialogues.text: If it is to help with the murder case, I am more than willing to share.

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: Who do you want to approach and talk to further?

choices.response: Search the area and find Birb.
Investigate Elon Tusk further.
